A: 1. Underdeveloped technology for food processing is a _? (a) blender (b) grinding stone (c) microwave)
2. A mud house is an example of _ accommodation? (a) developed (b) modern (c) underdeveloped)
3. Pipe-borne water is a _ source of water? (a) developed (b) natural (c) traditional)
4. An aircraft is an example of _ transportation? (a) slow (b) developed (c) horse-drawn)
5. What is an example of underdeveloped communication? (a) Radio (b) Gong (c) Telephone)
6. A blender is used for _ processing? (a) food (b) water (c) air)
7. An electric cooker is used for _? (a) cleaning (b) cooking of food (c) transportation)
8. A storey building is a type of _ accommodation? (a) developed (b) simple (c) old)
9. Well water is a _ source of water? (a) modern (b) developed (c) underdeveloped)
10. A horse-drawn carriage is an example of _ transportation? (a) developed (b) fast (c) underdeveloped)
11. Plants are _ things? (a) non-living (b) living (c) artificial)
12. Plants can grow, move and _? (a) fly (b) reproduce (c) speak)
13. Plants are sensitive to touch or _? (a) sound (b) darkness (c) sunlight)
14. Plants need _ to survive? (a) air (b) rocks (c) plastic)
15. Plants feed on food substances in the _? (a) air (b) soil (c) water bottle)
16. Light energy _ places? (a) darkens (b) illuminates (c) cools)
17. Green plants use light to make their _? (a) water (b) food (c) air)
18. Light travels in a _ line? (a) curved (b) zigzag (c) straight)
19. The sun gives us _ energy? (a) sound (b) heat (c) light)
20. Stars give off _ energy? (a) sound (b) light (c) chemical)
B: 1. What is an example of developed technology for cooking food? _________
2. What is a natural source of light? _________
3. What do plants feed on in the soil? _________
4. What type of energy illuminates places? _________
5. What ability do plants have to remove unwanted substances? _________

2. What form of energy illuminates places?
3. What kind of source is the sun for light?
4. What kind of technology is a blender?
